a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Figure illustrates educational attainment (average years of total education) versus productivity (GDP per hour worked).
Educational Attainment (average years of total education) (Barro Lee Education Dataset (2010))
Data source: Feenstra et al. (2015), Penn World Table (2021); Barro Lee Education Dataset (2010)
